mapper.select: SELECT M.USER_FROM, M.USER_TO, M.MS_CONTENT, M.MESSAGE_ID, M.MS_DATE, U.USERS_ID, U.LOGIN_ID FROM MESSAGE M JOIN USERS U ON M.USER_FROM = U.USERS_ID WHERE M.USER_FROM = #{userFrom} ORDER BY MS_DATE DESC
